name: Break it Down (Tiki720)
description:
In the arcade-like puzzle and finesse game, Break it Down, your goal is to deconstruct objects with your AI partner. Watch out, because some tools are too heavy for a human to pick up, and some won't fit a robotic gripper. Choose the right tool for the job, but be quick; you will get less time per deconstruction as the game progresses. With the additional challenge of the mirror effect of the AI, you must pay attention to your surroundings, and prioritize the varying aspects of each job.

In the end, all that matters to your employer are the vital reactor cores, and how fast you can collect them.

The controls are:

  • The mouse position controls the hand and gripper (the robot is mirrored over the belt)
  • Z Key, pick up/drop/interact with the human hand
  • X Key, pick up/drop/interact with the robot gripper

If you get stuck you should try:

  • Pressing the blue 'next' button
  • Moving the mouse over one of the human tools (bottom set) and pressing Z
  • Moving the held part over the crate/trash can and interacting with it.

This game was made for the Wowie Jam 4.0.
